overrides.brace-expansion: Security fix for CVE-2025-5889 (ReDoS vulnerability). Patches brace-expansion 1.1.11→1.1.12 and 2.0.1→2.0.2. Upstream dependency test-exclude@7.0.1 hasn't updated to use newer minimatch/glob versions yet.
overrides.@eslint/plugin-kit: Security fix for GHSA-xffm-g5w8-qvg7 (ReDoS vulnerability). Using override instead of updating eslint to avoid updating all other eslint dependencies. eslint@9.26.0 uses @eslint/plugin-kit@0.2.8 (vulnerable), but 0.4.0 is backward compatible.
